resources.string: Everything Looks good in XPL-EX sit back and relax!
There seems to be some warnings within the XPLEX Core!
Core tests to ensure Application is running at its best!
XLua Folder seems to Exists Consider Deleting it to avoid Detections assuming your XPL-EX Folder is created with its databases.
XPL-EX is Designed to prevent apps from getting device identifiers and more. ObbedCode wishes you luck, much love
What should I call you ? Enter a username does not matter wont be shared

Hello this is ObbedCode, this Project (was) based off of XPrivacy Lua til I decided to take it into a new direction put over 40000+ new lines of Code into it.

This project will be fully free and Open Source, no need for Unknown Code to protect your Privacy.

It uses Android Java Material UI with Rikka Apps Library, UI based from Shizuku.

The goal of this is to be you all in one Privacy Application for now can only provide Api Hooking!

Do as you please Modify anything as you please its FOSS no catches!
